original: intros Hc. destruct (Rle_lt_or_eq_dec a b) as [Hab | Heq]. - apply Rlt_Rle_dec in Hab. apply C0_extension_lt with (f:=f) (la:=f a) (lb:=f b) (a:=a) (b:=b). ++ auto. ++ intros c Hc'. apply Hc. split; apply Rlt_le; apply Rlt_trans with c; tauto. ++ apply filterlim_refl. ++ apply filterlim_refl. - exists (fun x : R => if Rle_dec a x then if Rle_dec x b then f x else f b else f a). split. ++ intros c. split. ** intros Hx. apply filterlim_refl. ** intros x. split; auto. - subst. exists f. split. ++ intros c. apply filterlim_refl. ++ intros c Hc'. exfalso. apply (Rlt_irrefl a). apply Rlt_trans with c; tauto.
